Set your status in Slack
A new way to let your teammates know what you’re up to

content.subtitle: A new way to let your teammates know what you’re up to

paragraphs.text: Love this!
paragraphs.name: e248

paragraphs.text: In the Mac App When hovering on any status balloon in the app, I see the status in a nice pretty bubble; But I also see a tooltip that says speech_balloon Occasionally the tooltip actually covers up the status.
paragraphs.name: 3f8e

paragraphs.text: It’s also weird that you include the 💬 in the actual status message when it’s right next to the user’s name and the thing I am hovering over.
paragraphs.name: 883a

paragraphs.name: 76ca

paragraphs.text:
Randy! 
1. You should totally build this. 
2. If you do, we’d *love* to hear all about it. 
3. Related to #2, can you email us at developers@slack.com with the subject line “Platform blog submission” (don’t worry — we won’t post a blog or anything without discussing with you, we just want to make sure the right people see it).
4. Did we mention you…
paragraphs.name: ccb1

paragraphs.text: Clark, there _is_ a slash command! /status [emoji] [text] ✨
paragraphs.name: 86aa

eaebac6633d8.title: Any plan to have those default statuses customizable?

paragraphs.text: Any plan to have those default statuses customizable? My Japanese team doesn’t get at first glance ‘Out sick’ or ‘Vacationing’ for instance, so it would be great to create our owns / change the language.
paragraphs.name: c23b

e5f149d550cb.title: There’s no keyboard shortcut, but you can use slash commands.

paragraphs.text: There’s no keyboard shortcut, but you can use slash commands. /status [emoji] [text] to set your status and /status clear once you’re done. Let us know what you think! 🙌🏾
paragraphs.name: fef7

94ac0d21540b.title: This was a bug that should be fixed now, sorry about that.

paragraphs.text: This was a bug that should be fixed now, sorry about that. Please write in to feedback@slack.com if you’re still seeing issues.

paragraphs.text: Hmm that doesn’t sound quite right. The tooltip shouldn’t cover your status. Do you mind writing in so we can look into it? feedback@slack.com 🔎

content.subtitle: Is there a keyboard shortcut to set my status? And then to set it to available?

paragraphs.text: Sorry about that. We rolled it out slowly throughout the day but it should be out to everyone now. If you still don’t see it, make sure you’re running the latest versions of the apps (slack.com/downloads).
